issue.title: [Format] Clarify example array in memory layout documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1416](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1416). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The memory layout example is left-right symmetric. If the example were instead asymmetric, then it would be clearer what bit endianness is used.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1416?focusedCommentId=16143779) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 998
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/998>
